attributes.action: Disqualify MP's who renage on election manifestos and ignore referenda results.
attributes.additional_details: If the EU becomes responsible for law making, defence, diplomacy and currency a system of regional government would be far more representative of the people and the people choices far more likely to be respected.  There will be no need of parliament as parliaments business will be conducted elsewhere.
attributes.background: Any MP back tracks on the promises made when campaigning for election and ignores the peoples choice when given in a referendum is undemocratic and not fit for purpose.  Where is the trust I see mostly patronising and arrogance.
